Instruction: Combine beaten eggs with sugar, then mix in milk and melted shortening or vegetable oil.

Combine the beaten eggs with sugar, then mix in milk and melted shortening or vegetable oil. In a separate bowl, sift together flour, salt, and baking powder. Gently combine the mixtures until just blended. Fold in blueberries and walnuts.
Pour the batter into a greased loaf pan. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 50-60 minutes. Allow the bread to cool slightly in the pan before removing it.
